mapper.select: select * from br_member where phone = #{account} or email = #{account} or username = #{account}
select * from br_statistics_handle_queue where handle_status = 0 order by create_time asc
select * from br_team_invite_statistics a where a.member_id = #{memberId} and to_days(a.statistics_date) = to_days(#{statisticsDate})
select * from br_direct_invite_statistics a where a.member_id = #{memberId} and to_days(a.statistics_date) = to_days(#{statisticsDate})

select a.id as memberId, a.phone, a.nickname, a.effective_status as effectiveStatus, a.avatar_url as avatarUrl, a.agent_ratio as agentRatio, b.invite_count as shareCount, b.team_count as teamCount, b.invite_effective_count as shareEffectiveCount, b.team_effective_count as teamEffectiveCount, b.agent_income as totalIncome, date_format(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as registerTime from br_member a left join br_member_statistics b on a.id = b.member_id where inviter_id = #{memberId}
